name: TV jammin'
description:
Your family is enjoying TV music. However, the TV signal is constantly getting jammed. So you have to stand by to repair the TV to keep your family happy. 

There is a happiness meter showing your family's mood. If it goes to zero, you have failed them :( If it gets filled up, you can rest assured that they are having a good time!

How to Play

Press and hold space-bar to charge a repair attack. Release to hit the TV. Your hit strength should match the signal distortion on the TV. For minor distortions, a small tap is sufficient. 

The Team

  • David Wise - Music
  • Stian Røbergeng - Graphics
  • Anette Rana - Programming, Game Design
  • Thomas Kort - Programming
